attributes.review: So i decided to download this app to see the reasons why i should vote for our president again this year but, it took 3 1/2 weeks to download and when i opened it played a song that gathered thousands of chickens from my whole town, both dead and alive and how they did that i dont know, to my house and simultaneously, looted my entire house. they even took my shower and toilets. they just picked them up with their big strong chicken arms while i stood there watching them helplessly. and when i tried to exit out of the app, it played an alarm and all the bugs and woodland creatures from my backyard came and started attacking my goldfish. they then sacrificed it to the president 🍊 and started chanting something really weird. im still traumatized and scared. i was finally able to delete it. but my therapist doesn’t believe my story. i would not recommend buying this app. something similar happened to my friend, so there is obviously something going on with this app. 0/10 DONT BUY
attributes.title: Robbery

attributes.review:
So I’m very disappointed by this app I opened it with my dog’s friends 🐕 next to me and my 🐶 dogs friend is terrified of the color orange 🍊 and I forgot about his fear and my dogs 🐕 friend started freaking out and it was just crazy of what your app did to us ! 😕 and my 🐶 dogs friend was so scared his grandmother ate my Chicken and then my 🦷 tooth went onto the roof and we were trying to save my 🦷 tooth 🧚🏼💕❗️ and then I saw my Cheeto on the ground dead !!! Luckily my tooth is okay. And my dog’s friend ate my noodles and takis while freaking out over his fear and I was very disappointed by that. I miss my Cheeto very much. But I’m glad that my dog’s friend is okay along with my tooth. ❤️🦷 but that makes me feel no better about this app ! I’m horrified of the fear that my tooth went through and my 🐕 dog’s friend. I will not expect this crisis. And nor will I forget 😿. And that’s the reason why I give this app such a bad review.  𝙸𝚏 𝚒 𝚑𝚊𝚍 𝚝𝚑𝚎 𝚘𝚙𝚙𝚝𝚒𝚘𝚗 𝚒 𝚠𝚘𝚞𝚕𝚍 𝚐𝚒𝚟𝚎 𝚝𝚑𝚒𝚜 𝚊 𝟶 star ⭐️ I’m so very disappointed 😔. 🧚🏼💫 
OBOMA 2020!
attributes.title: the streets 🥕🧚🏼🧚🏼🐶💫

attributes.review: Honestly I was really excited to download the app, but I noticed how whenever I was on the app it would kick me off or even crash. However when I managed to get on the app in my car I saw the scariest US president ever 🍊, my whole phone fell out my car in shock. I quickly stopped the car only to notice my car wheels on top of the device!! I believe the president owes me a new IPhone 11 Pro Max!! And many more for all the trauma!! However I found a new way to download the app, I install the app on my neighbors, brother, dogs, pet fishes phone. I am a fan and was VERY excited to see the re-elections and the growth of our president!! So I gave the app another chance. When going on the app it would continue to kick me off and crash my neighbors, brothers, dog, pet fishes phone. I couldn’t return the device like that so I had to pay 127 DOLLARS WITH TAX to repair the phone!! I am no longer a fan and do NOT want to see the growth of our president!!! If I could I WOULD give this app ZERO stars ✨🍊
attributes.title: For the orange 💅

attributes.review:
so i downloaded this app to see more of his policies. and to save barren. but i opened the app and a flying cheeto came out of the screen. and i wanted to eat it. but little did i know it was trying to attack me. so i chopped it in half with my teeth. then i yelled at me for cutting its wing off. the told me a lie saying that if i opened the app again mr. cheeto would go away. so i’m stupid and opened the app again and a witch and all sorts of creatures and people came out and attacked me because i ate mr. cheeto. also very sorry mr. cheeto. RIP. then i deleted the app then they all went away so then i went to my kitchen and got chocolate pudding to celebrate my win. but then i saw a evil squirrel that i saw before and he attacked me and i took an acorn from him and threw it at his head and then he said he was sorry and that we can be friends so now i have a squirrel living in my room and it’s all because of this app. but then suddenly i was attacked in my sleep by this squirrel and i 🥰🧚‍♀️died🥰🧚‍♀️. so thanks for that. also it’s okay that your app is horrible because
 ❤️🧚‍♀️apps are for some people❤️🧚‍♀️
🥰🧚‍♀️but nothing for you 🧚‍♀️🥰

if you’ve made it this far in my experience with this app then congratulations you read all of my ❤️🧚‍♀️horrible grammar❤️🧚‍♀️. 

if you want to help rate this app a one please do it and at the bottom of your review wright “from tiktok” or “tiktoks work is coming for you trump”
attributes.title: THIS APP IS CRAZY also ty tiktok

attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD🙀🤚🏼😾 , the app suxs it’s very  laggy and it froze my whole screen for 10 minutes I was gonna delete it but and 5 big foots showed up at my door and said “download the app and give it 5 stars review 😾” and so I said okay , next day they showed up at my house AGAIN and told me that I didn’t do it 😡so I told them to enter , so they said “we have to search the whole house 😾” I said okay and so 3 of them fell for trap and then they I found them DED💀 , and so I took the other 2 upstairs they saw my room and found the love of my life Harry Styles 🙀 , and then they told me why didn’t I vote for trum- tru- I said “ because the birds will eat him” yk since he is a Cheeto puff , and then I said “ he is homophobic racist transphobic and ORANGE” so no one wants that and then they said “you got a point” and they left , few hours later they came back saying “we were 5 how did we become 2?” I said “GET THE F OUT” and so they left and I’m living In happiness with my favorite generation aka gen z 🥰✨😹🧚🏻‍♀️💕
attributes.title: VERY UGLY NO KS FOR HIM ✨😘🍞

attributes.review: IF I COULD GIVE A 0 STAR RATING I WOULD. It robbed my house and took all of the dog meat I had for my Megalodon I was gonna go to the pound to gat more dogs but they booted my car!!! I HAD TO WALK DOWN THE STREET CARRYING 10 DEAD DOGS AND HUMILIATED MY SELF. I TRIED TO DELETE THIS APP AND MY MEGALODON DIED THE SECOND AFTER I DID. I think it is connected. I just wanna know how I can get another Megalodon, I spent billions on my last one and he’s dead, wait, it might have been a she... I never got close enough to check, my brother went swimming with IT and the water was so filled with blood that I didn’t see him again, I hope he’s ok. My boyfriend also tried to find out if it was a male or female as I went to my kitchen to get a snack and he disappeared... IM NOT A MURDERER I SWEAR. FRED IS, or if it WAS a girl, FREDRA IS. IF YOU DONT WANT TO HAVE THE FBI SURROUNDING YOUR HOUSE CAUSE APPARENTLY SOME KAREN SAW YOU CARRYING 10 DEAD DOGS DOWN THE ROAD TO FEED YOUR MEGALODON, DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP, THEY WILL KILL YOUR MEGALODON AND ROB YOUR HOUSE AND MAKE A FOOL OUT OF YOU ALL WHILE THE FBI ARE POINTING LOADED GUNS AT YOU FOR TRYING TO KEEP A MASSIVE MURDERING ANIMAL ALIVE, PERIOD
attributes.title: THIS APP IS JUST AS BAD AS TRUMP HIM SELF

attributes.review: I just bought my brand new Iphone 11 this weeknd. I love❤️my country so much that I knew the Trump 2020 app needed to be the first app I get. I instantly regretted this decision🤦🏼‍♂️. As soon as I opened the app my phone crashed☠️. I tried to turn it off and back on. No change. My phone won’t keep a charge💀 and the screen has quit working all together. Yestedy I took a trip🚜 down the road to the apple store where they told me that “this app gave my phone an incurable virus🦠!” and “that the only way to fix the issue is to outright buy a new phone!💵📱!” I’m am so angry but because I am a God fearin🙏🏻, gun totin🦾, flag wavin🇺🇸, conservative, and free AMERICAN🇺🇸 I know that MY PRESIDENT DONALD J. TRUMP👨‍💼 had nothing to do with this awful virus 🦠 and that this was one of the Lords may tests📝. As I sit here this wendsdy afternoon I know that I must vote for 🇺🇸TRUMP 2020🇺🇸and pray🙏🏻 that thay can cure this terrible virus 🦠 in this app so me and other TRUE AMERICANS can have a safe place to speak without the snowflake❄️liberals ruining everything!
attributes.title: Horrible app👎🏻

attributes.review: WARNING: DON’T INSTALL! I opened the app, and felt this weight pound in my body. I felt like I was committing a sin. I literally felt my blood rushing through my body and my heart rate speeding up. Quite frankly, I was committing a sin!😕I looked at the screen and saw this orange figure. I then noticed it was that creepy perverted and racist man that I see making a fool out of himself on the TV everyday. So I screamed and panicked and DELETED the app. I was instantly relieved of the stress and pressure. I then wondered to myself how can oneself actually support this man?😳 After calling peaceful protesters THUGS, and calling Coronavirus the “Chinese” virus? He is obviously very prejudice! But I am proud to still call Obama my president.🤷🏾‍♂️😕 How can onself take A RACIST ORANGE seriously? That’s what we call a “president” in 2020? ANYWAY, don’t install this app! I am so glad it’s off my phone.. and feel so relieved. I felt like god saved me and I had pleased him the minute that app was removed from my phone🙏🏾Goodbye, and take this advice seriously! ITS A WARNING!!
attributes.title: Terrible and Possed App👎🏾

attributes.review: i got this app to support my favorite orange cheetos oppar👨‍🦳🥵 as he is one of the most loved💔oppars in idiotville, oregon. one day i was having the usual cult meeting with my fellow oppar supporters👩‍👩‍👧‍👧when suddenly oli london oppar💁🏼‍♂️fell down from the sky🌩 from his ufo. ever since he’s been stalking me and my sugar daddie mason🥰. how shocked😮we were. and ever since i got this app bad things started happening😔😫. i was on the app when all of a sudden my bff👯‍♀️and loml😍 mason oppar was being harassed by oli london stans (kaachi👩‍👩‍👧‍👧and dixie👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩) dixie threatened mason oppar to break up💔 with me to go to her. what’s worse is now my phone always plays (ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆) everyday at 3am which is disturbing my usual streaming time (stream spring day, epiphany, sweet night, and ON for clear skin😘😘😘). oh how terrible😫. this bad is giving me bad vibes and is turning me into a.... k-karen😔. WHAT A NIGHTMARE. this app is horrendous and such a disappointment. I WILL NEVER DOWNLOAD THIS APP EVER AGAIN!!!!!!!!!!!!! - namtiddie kim🍑🍒
